title: Fix chatroom page styling: progress bar color, chat input border, and header logo

requirements.text: In the Header component, change the progress bar background color from 'bg-accent' to match the site's blue color used for other inputs

quotes: the background color for the progress bar is still using bg-accent instead of the sites blue, thats why its not visible. please fix it so its blue just like the other inputs

acceptanceCriteria: Progress bar background uses the same blue color as other input fields
Progress bar is clearly visible against the background

requirements.text: In the MessageInput component, remove the unnecessary border from the chat input textarea

quotes: also remove the unnecessary border in the chat input

acceptanceCriteria: Chat input textarea has no visible border
Input maintains proper spacing and alignment without the border

requirements.text: In the Header component, update the Chattr logo to use a rounded-full background with bg-primary, containing a message-circle icon (24x24) with text-primary-foreground color. The logo container should be flex h-10 w-10 items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-primary

quotes: also the chattr logo in the header is supposed to be styled like this:

acceptanceCriteria: Logo displays as a circular background with primary color
Message circle icon is properly sized (h-6 w-6) and uses primary-foreground text color

constraints: Only modify styling in Header.tsx and MessageInput.tsx
Maintain existing component structure and props
nonGoals: Changing other UI components not mentioned
Adding new features beyond the specified styling fixes
